tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name STRING,
    email STRING UNIQUE,
    phone_number STRING,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender STRING,
    profile_picture STRING,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    birth_date DATE,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    theme_color VARCHAR(20),
    language VARCHAR(20),
    currency VARCHAR(10),
    notification_preferences JSONB,
    CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  theme VARCHAR(50),
  language VARCHAR(50),
  currency VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(id)
)

CREATE TABLE user_settings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_settings BOOLEAN,
  dark_mode_enabled BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
password_hash VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE user_settings (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
dark_mode BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
notifications BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
theme VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'light');

CREATE TABLE wallet_transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
amount NUMERIC(10, 2) NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    profile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    birth_date DATE,
    address VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    theme VARCHAR(20),
    language VARCHAR(20),
    notification_enabled BOOLEAN
);
